about.title: About me
about.text1: Software Engineer with 4 years of experience in the tech market, having worked with global giants like Ambev and Johnson & Johnson.
about.text2: Today, as an entrepreneur, I help professionals and companies position themselves digitally with authority, connecting brands to their audience in Brazil and worldwide.
about.text3: Specialized in creating high-performance, scalable interfaces, focused on delivering measurable results and experiences that retain users.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: Our website only collects basic information you voluntarily provide through our contact form, such as your <highlight>name</highlight>, <highlight>company</highlight>, or <highlight>topic</highlight> of interest.
privacy.section2Text: This information is used exclusively to facilitate our initial contact via WhatsApp. We do not store this data in permanent databases and do not share it with third parties.
privacy.section3Text: When using the contact form, you will be redirected to the WhatsApp platform. From that point on, the processing of your data follows WhatsApp's own privacy terms.
privacy.section4Text: If you have any questions about how we handle your simple contact data, you can reach me directly through the channels available in the footer of this website.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Before starting your project, it's normal to have questions. Here are the most common ones.

items.question: How long does it take to build a website?
items.answer: The timeline depends on the project type, but on average, institutional websites are ready within 5 to 15 business days after content submission and layout approval.

items.question: Do I need a domain and hosting?
items.answer: If you don't have them yet, we'll help you register and set everything up. The site is delivered with domain and hosting ready to use.

items.question: Can I request changes after delivery?
items.answer: Yes. After delivery, you have a free adjustment period for small details. We also offer ongoing maintenance plans.

items.question: Will my site appear on Google?
items.answer: Yes. All websites are delivered with SEO configured to help with ranking and appearing in search results over time.

items.question: Does the site work well on mobile?
items.answer: Absolutely. All projects are responsive, meaning they automatically adapt to any screen size.
